personalInfo.clubAffl: Williams Lake Golf and Tennis Club

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt / 71st qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: Has yet to tee it up in a Nationwide Tour or PGA TOUR event...Played on the Canadian Tour from 2008-11.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the 2000 British Columbia Junior Match Play Championship...Attended Columneetza High School...Was named to the Pac-10 All-Academic first team all four years at Oregon State...Won the Glen Klein Community Service Award.
tourBios.personal: Biggest thrill in golf is holing out fairway shots. Biggest thrill outside of golf is waiting for the Vancouver Canucks to win the Stanley Cup...Never travels without his iPod...Always carries a Candadian quarter...Top website is nhl.com...Favorite college team is the Oregon State Beavers, and his top pro team is the Vancouver Canucks. Favorite TV show is anything on the NHL Network, and his favorite athletes to watch are hockey players...Twitter account is @mitchgillis...Carries protein shakes and nuts for a snack on the course...Not many people know that he can build his own computer from scratch...Bucket list includes running a marathon in under 3 1/2 hours and be asked to drop the puck at a Canucks game...Supports the Ronan Thompson Foundation to fight childhood cancer.

tourBios.carHigh: His best finish on PGA TOUR Canada came at the 2010 TOUR Championship where he finished T-2, Cracked the Top 10 four times in 2009: Players Cup (T-8), Tour Championship (T-8), Seaforth Country Classic (T-9), and Riviera Maya Open (T-10), Made a big jump forward that year moving from 100th to 21st on the Order of Merit, His best finish in his rookie 2008 campaign was a T-15 in Seaforth, Shot 76-69- 77-71-293 at the 2007 Fall Qualifying School to earn non-exempt status in 2008
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the 2007 B.C. Amateur, 2007 Oregon Amateur Medalist, 2006 Oregon Stroke Play Champion, 2006 Wolverine Invitational Champion, Won the 2006 Pacific Northwest Golf Association Public Links, 2006 Oregon Amateur Champion, Semi-finalist at the 2007 Canadian Amateur, Member of British Columbia's victorious 2001 Junior America's Cup team, Represented Canada at the 2000 Junior Open Championships, Won the 2000 B.C. Match Play Championship
tourBios.otherInfo: 2006 Oregon Golf Association Player of the Year, 2006 Pacific Northwest Golf Association Player of the Year, Three-time Pac-10 All- Academic honouree
tourBios.prYrSeason: Earned status on the Web.com Tour in 2012
